author: rdonkin
msg: The BinaryGuesser uses the platform encoding to guess whether a document is binary. This means that this test fails on some encodings. The binary guesser code base is relatively stable, so let's trade a little coverage for tests that run on more platforms. Feel free to add more encodings that we know work.

author: suresh
msg: Moving HDFS-3961 change from release 1.1 to 1.2

author: oheger
msg: - Made equals() implementation comply to the general contract of equals().

author: suresh
msg: HDFS-3961. FSEditLog preallocate() preallocated more than 1MB. Contributed by Jing Zhoa.
